header.title: Boost Your Development with Nimbus Boilerplate
header.welcome: Welcome to Nimbus Boilerplate, your all-in-one solution to quickly start your modern web projects with Next.js, Auth.js, Shadcn UI, and more.

readyToUse.label: Ready to Use :
readyToUse.description: Start your projects in no time with a robust initial setup.

authIntegrated.label: Auth.js Integrated :
authIntegrated.description: Secure authentication with popular providers like Google and GitHub.

modernUI.label: Modern UI :
modernUI.description: Use Shadcn UI for sleek and responsive components.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Get your projects up and running in no time, thanks to a robust initial configuration.

steps.label: Quick Installation
steps.description: Clone the repository and follow the instructions to install dependencies.

steps.label: Simple Configuration
steps.description: Customize your project with clear and well-documented configuration files.

steps.label: Easy Deployment
steps.description: Deploy your application on Vercel, Netlify, or your preferred platform.

quotes.text: "Nimbus Boilerplate saved me valuable time on my projects. The integration of authentication and UI components is a real plus!"
quotes.author: Jean Dupont, Frontend Developer

quotes.text: "A complete solution to quickly start with Next.js. I highly recommend it!"
quotes.author: Marie Curie, Software Engineer

community.title: Join the Community
community.description: Share your ideas, ask questions, and collaborate with other developers on our Discord and GitHub.

getStarted.title: Get Started Now
getStarted.description: Ready to boost your development? Download Nimbus Boilerplate and start today!
